page.title: 17A BORDON PUPIL 1
page.content: The day starts at 8.35 a.m. when a bell goes for the start of tutor time.We all sit down very quickly before Mrs. Crocker comes into the room to register.After registration we sit and talk about last night's T.V.When the bell goes we all rush off to our next lesson. Today it's French first. We all line up outside the classroom until Mrs. Gosney is ready to take us.She then tells us to come in and sit down. French is pretty boring and we're all glad when the bell goes. Then it's Humanities with Mr. Bovington. After that we go to Break.English is next,then lunch. After lunch it's Maths with Mr, Alexander. This is a brilliant lesson. When the bell goes we go home. When I get home I go swimming.
